data.name: Hackshot
data.detailed_description:
Join our game discussions


About the Game

You start hacking the source of popup ads and things escalate quickly...

Craft your solution => Mix and match abilities in creative ways

Immerse yourself into open-ended levels => Multiple solutions per level

> Gameplay();

  • Over 20 hours of shooting viruses and crashing security
  • Open-ended levels, with multiple solutions per level
  • Over 7000 unique cyberballs to craft
  • Hackers will hack you back
  • Security will detect your presence

> Story();

Hack the biggest tech corporation ever using a word document, in a fun story with a terabyte of good old internet scam, and a touch of cool cleverness.


> Accessibility_and_game_settings();

  • Supports both windowed and fullscreen, and also support ultrawide screen resolutions
  • Button remapping, and support for keyboard, mouse and controllers
  • Full support for touch screens both in gameplay and menus
  • The ability to turn off visuals that have repeated patterns
  • Color blind modes
  • There is a quit button in the game :)

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1757450/Hackshot/

data.short_description: HackShot is a twisted puzzle take on artillery games in a cyberworld where Trojan viruses are actual horses. You have the ability to craft unique projectiles by mixing and matching different abilities, use your crafting imagination to solve problems in creative ways.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Ryzen 3, 32 or 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 / SM2-compatible card ( generally everything made since 2004 should work )
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 333 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Ryzen 3, 32 or 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 / SM2-compatible card ( generally everything made since 2004 should work )
  • Storage: 333 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
